message.body: We are booked to check in 12/24 and out 12/27!
Fantastic!!! Just need mom to get that car reserves ASAP!
I can reserve it for her tonight. You dont need card info to reserve.
I'll do it w her on the phone tonight
Awesome!!! Let me know!
188.18 plus taxes for 4 and a half days
Just got quotes for moms car....
203.44 plus taxes if she wants a car a bit bigger (focus or corrolla)
Sweet! These prices are good.
Temple gave me a small travel grant of 500!!
Whaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaat
I KNOW.
Thats so awesome!!!! I didnt think they would since you were done
They "made an exception" because it's a bigger festival and they are in my credits.
The festival is going to put me in a condo with other filmmakers. Might have to sleep on the floor but it will be cheaper!
That will be amazing. Ifffff We plan it and I can go, we can split a hotel if you want. If not, i understand.
So exciting!
No dates yet still?
Of course!! I will know hopefully by the end of the week.
Keep me posted. So u have 400 for posters and cds and 500 for travel. Can you get other grants too?
I'm waiting to hear back from uarts.
They have a faculty grant but it's for full time
No one wrote me back yesterday.
Ha
Even if you don't get anymore grants, at this point, probably half your trip is covered. So happy for ya!
Exactly. I feel like now it's a reality.
I'm going to attend the second screening during the week. All I know is there are two screenings, the weekend and the week.
I'll get back from chile on Saturday, will head to Utah early Monday morning or later depending on what day I screen.
Its all going to work out!
